vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.10;
father of: Jedaiah (H3048); also called Jehoiarib at 1Ch.9.10;
Also named: ye.ho.ya.riv (יְהוֹיָרִיב "Jehoiarib" H3080H)
§ Joiarib = "Jehovah contends"
1) the head of the 1st of the 24 courses of priests in David's time
2) a teacher in the time of Ezra
3) a Judaite in the time of Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hombre; post exílico; (b)   hijo de Zacarías; tribu de Judá; post exílico; (c) יְהוֹיָרִיב   sacerdote; tribu de Leví; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約雅立 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華論辯"
1) 一個祭司家族
2) 以斯拉時期一個老師 #拉 8:16|
3) 尼希米時期一個一個猶大人 #尼 11:5|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约雅立 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华论辩"
1) 一个祭司家族
2) 以斯拉时期一个老师 #拉 8:16|
3) 尼希米时期一个一个犹大人 #尼 11:5|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.8.16
§ Joiarib = "Jehovah contends"
1) the head of the 1st of the 24 courses of priests in David's time
2) a teacher in the time of Ezra
3) a Judaite in the time of Nehemiah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.5;
son of: Zechariah (H2148W);
father of: Adaiah (H5718M)
§ Joiarib = "Jehovah contends"
1) the head of the 1st of the 24 courses of priests in David's time
2) a teacher in the time of Ezra
3) a Judaite in the time of Nehemiah
